header1: Google Camera ported to Razer Phone 2; drastically improves images
subheader1: Google Pixel 3 and Pixel 3 XL are currently the best camera smartphones in the market. Since smartphone cameras are not just limited to the hardware that they use but also the software they power, it has been proven that the reason behind such stunning photos on the Pixel 3 is the Google Camera application. Since the release of Pixel 3 and Pixel 3 XL last month, developers have been scrambling to port the new version of Google camera app to other smartphones to see how it performs against stock camera app. The newest device to become part of such an exercise is the Razer Phone 2.
header2: Apple cancels production boost for iPhone XR: Report
subheader2: Apple Inc has told its smartphone assemblers Foxconn and Pegatron to halt plans for additional production lines dedicated to its new iPhone XR, the Nikkei financial daily reported Nikki Asian Review on Monday. Apple shares fell nearly 4 percent after the report, which fueled concerns that the iPhone XR, the cheapest of three iPhones Apple unveiled in September, was facing weak demand just days after it hit shelves.
